# Letter of Interest (LOI): Lunar Exploration Accelerator Program (LEAP) Science Instrument
## Solicitation Number
WS3735655348

## Solicitation Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Canadian Space Agency (CSA), invites the industry and academia to participate in the upcoming procurement activities related to the Lunar Exploration Accelerator Program (LEAP) science instrument project element. 

A Request for Proposal (RFP) is expected to be published by PWGSC in Summer/Fall 2023. The RFP will outline the scope and objectives of the science instrument project element of the LEAP portfolio. The tender description is available in the attached solicitation documents at http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14655536.

## Important Details
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-16 ( Tender stands expired)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information:**
Name: Sameer Ali Abbasi
Email: [sameerali.abbasi@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sameerali.abbasi@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: Not available

## Submissions and Questions
Questions specific to the technical requirements of this LOI should be sent through the Event Messages board.
